attributes.action: Take down the sale of animals on www.lyst.com/
attributes.background: https://www.lyst.com/ are selling animals as a stunt. RSPCA have been in touch but they've given a terrible and unprofessional response. This is cruel and unkind, they're speaking about animals as a fashion accessory.

rejection.details:
The decision about whether to sell pets or not is a matter for Lyst, which is a private company.

You could try contacting Lyst directly to ask them to change their policy.

Or you could start a petition asking Parliament to pass a law restricting the sale of animals on the internet. You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
